work-item.field:
• Use cut and paste to move Work Items between the same document
  • Use copy and paste to copy a Work Item
  • Remove a Work Item simply by deleting the description in the document. These Work Items are still available in the Recycle Bin.


    Hint: You can delete a Work Item without first moving it to the Recycle Bin: click the Work Item icon in the left margin and select Delete on the menu.

  • You can also move a Work Item using the action menu in table or tree view and select "Move" to move Work Items.
• Deleted work items will still be visible in table view as they are moved to the recycle bin.
Move, Copy And Delete Work Items
